definition: (followed by a verb phrase, then – optionally – 不可, or 不行 etc) must
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: Other plants can't do without tanking up loads of sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 其它的植物就非得饱尝充足的阳光。

sentences.english: However, that does not necessary mean that a logo has to be very elaborated.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这并不意味着商标非得特别复杂。

sentences.english: Won't you join the party dressed to kill?
sentences.chinese: 你非得穿得这么妖艳去参加那个聚会吗？

sentences.english: Is the unending infliction of pain also required?
sentences.chinese: 非得施以永无休止的痛苦才行吗？

sentences.english: If you don't work harder, you'll end up having to go to a cow college.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不用功一点，就非得去上放牛大学不可。

sentences.english: Must we b(be) sbjct(subject) to yt(yet) another abrv(abbreviation)?
sentences.chinese: 我们非得忍受又一个缩写词吗？

sentences.english: She must see me off at the gates.
sentences.chinese: 后来非得把我送到学校门口才走。

sentences.english: As a child, I wondered why I had to struggle so.
sentences.chinese: 幼年时我纳闷为什么我非得如此刻苦努力。

sentences.english: Why should I wear a skirt? Or a dress?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我非得穿裙子或套裙呢？

sentences.english: Gaode not necessarily have to be a very grand, the soup boiled for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 不一定非得是搞得很隆重，煮上很长时间的浓汤。

sentences.english: Of course there is. In that case,I'll have to take you out.
sentences.chinese: 当然有啦，看这情形，我非得带你出去玩不可。

sentences.english: But they haven’t had to reach into their own pockets to cover payroll.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们不用非得得到这些钱来掩饰自己的工资单。

sentences.english: For me, the decision to undergo treatment was a no-brainer.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，接受治疗是情非得已的决定。

sentences.english: If I must dream in my sleep, please Hawaii for me.
sentences.chinese: 如果睡觉非得做梦的话，请再为我跳夏威夷舞吧。

definition: to want absolutely/to insist on (doing something)
firmly set on doing sth/to insist on doing/determined in one's course of action
to insist on doing sth/must do it, despite everything
otherwise/or else/or
there is no need/why should
must/have to/be bound to
not so/no/or else/otherwise/if not/How about ...?
nevertheless
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
(coll.) if
just/simply/stubbornly/really
otherwise/or else/how about...?/either... (or...)
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?

(indicates that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would wish) unfortunately/as it happened/(indicates that sth is the opposite of what would be normal or reasonable) stubbornly/contrarily/against reason/(indicates that sb or a group is singled out) precisely/only/of all people
why bother?/is it worth the trouble?
to think about it
